summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 45th Avenue Northeast, from East 45th Street to East 50th Street, and from the south line of Laurelvista Addition to East 54th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14643 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
